result.name: QTL map based candidate gene discovery for salt tolerance in rice
result.description: mapping the At 354 and Bg 352 rice varieties to Nipponbare rice genome (Os-Nipponbare-Reference-IRGSP-1.0) and to R498 rice genome (R498.Genome.version1)
result.center: Department of Biotechnology, Faculty of Agriculture and Plantation Management, Wayamba University of Sri Lanka, Kuliyapitiya, Sri Lanka.
